name: Blaziken
description: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon has 1/3 or less of its HP remaining, its fire-type moves inflict 1.5× as much regular damage.
abilities.description: Ups FIRE moves in a pinch.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage after each turn.
